title: Dwarven Vault
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship uncovers ancient secrets
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship investigates a deserted dwarven outpost, finding a magical Pearl of Power and hobgoblin graffiti.
They negotiate with Inakara, a creature guarding the tunnels, to gain access to a vault.
Inside the vault, they discover treasure including the Shield of the Brawnanvil Clan, a magical warhammer, potions, driftglobes, and trade bars.
The scene of an ancient battle with a mind flayer raises concerns about the return of these creatures.
The Fellowship finds a tunnel leading to Raven's Hold and negotiates passage with Inakara.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship uncovers a trove of dwarven treasures and signs of an ancient mind flayer encounter in a long-abandoned dwarven vault.
